this_title: Imagine... Pet Shop Boys Then and Now
introduction: “Pet Shop Boys: Then and Now”, a new “Imagine…“ documentary feature with Alan Yentob, will be airing on BBC One on 16th April. This is the first time Neil and Chris have allowed backstage access to a camera team, accompanying them during the Dreamworld tour for an intimate look inside the world and creations of Pet Shop Boys. In this feature, Alan Yentob will also be talking to Tennant and Lowe about the new PSB album,“Nonetheless”, and their creative evolution over the past four decades. Further guests include the duo’s longtime manager, Angela Becker, Olly Alexander, Marc Almond, Brandon Flowers, James Ford, Stuart Price, Miranda Sawyer, Jake Shears and Rufus Wainwright. Further details at the link below.
